name: Feedier: Go beyond feedback
author: Feedier team

sections.description:
Feedier is a platform to manage feedback from your visitors, customers, and fans. This plugin is designed to integrate seamlessly Feedier into WordPress in 30 seconds.

Best if you’re looking for quality feedback (no reviews) and top response rate to get real-time insights.

Why Feedier?
1. Create amazing feedback forms
2. Trigger the form in a beautiful widget at key touchpoints such as a specific page, exit intent, page bottom or even manually using an extensive JavaScript API.
3. Manage all feedback in one platform to get visual insights.

Learn more about Feedier: Feedier Landing page

Feedier WordPress integration feature:
– Manage widget display rule to only show the feedback widget at the right moment
– Design the widget to match your brand
– Easy link to the Feedier dashboard and feedback listing
sections.installation:
1. Create a free Feedier account here: Feedier Dashboard
  2. Create your feedback form in Feedier
  3. Copy/paste your API keys from the API page: Feedier Integrations page
  4. Customize the widget to match your style
  5. Create one or several display rules
sections.faq:
Is it free?

It’s freemium model, you can start for Feedier for free and get 1 form with 100 quality feedback per month. Need more insights? We have packages that suit your needs: Feedier Pricing page

Can I customize the design?

Yes, you can use the Design tab in the plugin settings. But also use some CSS to make it yours. All detailed in the design tab.
